intro: Improve your skills and become the ultimate truck driver.
description:
Step into the driver’s seat and master the art of heavy vehicle control in Trucking School: Truck Simulator Driving 2025! Learn how to maneuver massive trucks with precision, tackle challenging courses, and handle real-world driving scenarios in a safe, immersive simulation environment. Whether you’re training for logistics, construction, or just love big rigs, this simulator puts you in full control.

- Realistic Truck Handling: Experience authentic physics and controls that make every turn, brake, and gear shift feel lifelike.
- Comprehensive Driving Lessons: Learn basic maneuvers, advanced driving techniques, and professional truck handling skills.
- Challenging Courses: Navigate through urban streets, tight parking lots, highways, and obstacle-filled training grounds.
- Customizable Trucks: Choose from a variety of vehicles and customize them for performance and style.
- Progressive Training System: Complete lessons, earn certifications, and unlock new challenges as you improve your skills.

Become a master truck driver, conquer every course, and prove you have what it takes to handle the biggest rigs on the road!
